mapper.insert: insert into DB_COM_CODE (CLASS_CODE, COM_CODE, COM_NAME, USE_YN, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG) values (#{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DB_COM_CODE set COM_NAME = #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DTM = #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BKCK_FG = #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CLASS_CODE = #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COM_CODE = #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CLASS_CODE, COM_CODE, COM_NAME, USE_YN, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_COM_CODE
